name: bitch
description: bitch is a game created in Twine Harlowe 3. The player (when playing as a woman) experiences microaggressions and even a proposition for quid-pro-quo harassment. On the other hand, the player can also choose to play as a man, who notices a few strange things in the office, but overall comes out unscathed. The game is best experienced when played more than once, and at least once from each perspective.
